thread.title: Conviviality Retails sidesteps takeover questions to focus on growth story

title: Conviviality Retails sidesteps takeover questions to focus on growth story
text:
13 Jul 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Conviviality Retail sought to shake any shadow potentially cast over todayâ€™s full-year results by the headline-grabbing reverse takeover bid of wine wholesale Matthew Clark by refusing to answer any questions on the subject. Available to members only
